docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, July 28 (AP) A criminal court judge who sent several convicted terrorists to jail was kidnapped today by youths who identified themselves as Tupamaros, members of an urban guerrilla organization.
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, July 28 (AP) A criminal court judge who sent several convicted terrorists to jail was kidnapped today by youths who identified themselves as Tupamaros, members of an urban guerrilla organization.
docs.abstract: Guerrilla youths kidnap Judge D Pereira, who has sentenced several terrorists, and attempt to seize union official visiting Pereira; police clash with students shortly afterwards

headline.main: Judge in Guerrilla Cases is Kidnapped in Uruguay
News Summary and Index; The Major Events of the Day

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, July 31 The chief United States adviser to the Uruguayan police force and the Brazilian consul were kidnapped by Marxist guerrillas here today. Two other American officials were injured in an unsuccessful kidnapping attempt.
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, July 31 The chief United States adviser to the Uruguayan police force and the Brazilian consul were kidnapped by Marxist guerrillas here today. Two other American officials were injured in an unsuccessful kidnapping attempt.
docs.abstract: Consul in Montevideo A M Dias Gomides kidnapped by Tupamaro guerrillas; seizure apparently coordinated with that of US adviser D A Mitrione

headline.main: GUERRILLAS SEIZE TWO IN URUGUAY; Hold U.S., Brazilian Aides Two Others Escape 2 Kidnapped by Uruguayan Guerrillas

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Aug. 1 Despite more than 50 arrests by the Uruguayan police during the last 24 hours, the authorities have apparently made no important progress toward freeing a United States police adviser and a Brazilian diplomat kidnapped...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Aug. 1 Despite more than 50 arrests by the Uruguayan police during the last 24 hours, the authorities have apparently made no important progress toward freeing a United States police adviser and a Brazilian diplomat kidnapped yesterday by Marxist guerrillas.
docs.abstract: police arrest over 50 in search; kidnappers are reptdly demanding release of 7 prisoners including M Lluveras. high ranking Tupamaro, and woman companion of Tupamaro chief R Sendic; authenticity of report doubted; US and Brazilian Govts expected to press for exchange if demanded

headline.main: URUGUAY PRESSES GUERRILLA DRIVE; Arrests 50 in Effort to Free U.S. and Brazilian Aides

byline.original: By MALCOLM W. BROWNE Special to The New York Times

docs.snippet: MONTEVIEDO, Uruguay, Aug. 2 (AP) Uruguayan guerrillas today demanded the release of more than 100 political prisoners as ransom for a kidnapped American security expert and a Brazilian diplomat.
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIEDO, Uruguay, Aug. 2 (AP) Uruguayan guerrillas today demanded the release of more than 100 political prisoners as ransom for a kidnapped American security expert and a Brazilian diplomat.
docs.abstract: guerrillas demand release of more than 100 pol prisoners and passage to Mex, Peru or Algeria, statement given to newspaper; Pres Pacheco maintains refusal to 'negotiate with criminals'; speculation that he might grant gen amnesty to all pol prisoners

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Aug. 3 (AP) The Government refused today to give a "yes" or "no" to a leftist guerrilla demand that all political prisoners be released as ransom for two kidnapped foreign officials.
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Aug. 3 (AP) The Government refused today to give a "yes" or "no" to a leftist guerrilla demand that all political prisoners be released as ransom for two kidnapped foreign officials.

keywords.value: ELIZABETH, QUEEN MOTHER OF GREAT BRITAIN

docs.snippet: Ilka Suarez, whose shop is on 60th Street near Second Avenue, says she does not do custom, but she does make knits to measure. She's a little particular about what  those measurements are, though. They should be no more than a size 12, and while Miss...
docs.lead_paragraph: Ilka Suarez, whose shop is on 60th Street near Second Avenue, says she does not do custom, but she does make knits to measure. She's a little particular about what those measurements are, though. They should be no more than a size 12, and while Miss Suarez will take on a 14 now and then she thinks no woman should let herself get bigger than that what she really

headline.main: Ilka Suarez Knits: Not for the Pudgy

docs.snippet: BRASILIA, Aug. 5 The Brazilian military Government yesterday ordered swift action to halt the slaying of petty criminals by vigilante groups called death squads and also ordered faster police investigations and trials for political crimes.
docs.lead_paragraph: BRASILIA, Aug. 5 The Brazilian military Government yesterday ordered swift action to halt the slaying of petty criminals by vigilante groups called death squads and also ordered faster police investigations and trials for political crimes.
docs.abstract: Govt orders action against death squads and faster trials for pol crimes; human rights council meets, hears charges of police violence; Buzaid orders police, who have held prisoners indefinitely, to turn terrorism and subversion cases over to cts

headline.main: BRAZIL WILL CURB VIGILANTE GROUPS; Official Rights Council Also Hears Torture Charges

byline.original: By JOSEPH NOVITSKI Special to The New York Times
